workflow.title: Author Publications and Citations by Year with 2D Histogram
workflow.description: This workflow demonstrates how to connect to and use Europe PMC (http://europepmc.org/RestfulWebService) to count the number of publications and citations per year for one author. Two Web service calls are made. First, we searchPublications to retrieve the bibliographic records for all published work of a single author. Then, we getCitations to extract the year of all articles citing the work of this author. The pubYear fields is extracted from the raw Web service results and fed to an Rshell that produces three histograms as output, two with publications and citations, very similar to the "Citation Report" in the Thomson Reuters Web of Science, and one "heatmap" showing the number of citations as function of citing and cited paper publication year.
